QuestData.Title: Moozy's Sojourn
QuestData.Description:
My son! They took him! My wife and I split up to look for him. She went upriver and I went downriver.
Leave me, please, and find Moozy... I might be okay... If you find Moozy, please bring him to my wife upriver.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Moozy downriver in Whitewater Wash.
QuestData.RewardText: <Moozy squeals in delight at your presence.>
